name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D新衣装お披露目】宝鐘マリン生誕3D LIVE ！！重大告知あり！ゲスト多数＆サクラ大戦から豪華ゲストも！！【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】#宝鐘マリ [1WbyakjUmsI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Marine Shukkou!!' with guest Chisa Yokoyama and a Koubu robot.
MC segment where Marine introduces guest Chisa Yokoyama.

subtitles.original: ヨーホーホーホー　ハラヘー
subtitles.english: Yo-ho-ho-ho, Hara-he...

subtitles.original:
マリン出航！！
作詞：畑亜貴　作曲・編曲：田中公平
subtitles.english:
Marine Shukkou!!
Lyrics: Aki Hata  Composition/Arrangement: Kohei Tanaka

subtitles.original: 世界が壊れてゆく
subtitles.english: The world is breaking apart.

subtitles.original: 泣き声が聞こえていた
subtitles.english: I could hear the voices crying out.

subtitles.original: 汚れた拳　痛むほど
subtitles.english: I clenched my dirty fists...

subtitles.original: 強く握った
subtitles.english: ...so hard it hurt.

subtitles.original: 当たり前に笑っていた昨日はもうどこにもない
subtitles.english: The yesterday when we laughed normally is nowhere to be found.

subtitles.original: 明日がどんな日になるのか誰も知らない
subtitles.english: No one knows what kind of day tomorrow will be.

subtitles.original: 圧政にさえ　捨てられた蝶
subtitles.english: A butterfly abandoned even by tyranny...

subtitles.original: 取り戻すこと誓う
subtitles.english: ...I swear to take it back.

subtitles.original: 怒り上げ　勇気の旗掲げて旅立とう
subtitles.english: Raise the anchor, hoist the flag of courage, and let's set off.

subtitles.original: 嵐の海　立ち上がれ
subtitles.english: Rise up in the stormy sea.

subtitles.original: 幸せは願えば手に入るほど安くはない
subtitles.english: Happiness is not so cheap that you can get it just by wishing.

subtitles.original: 守るために戦うなら海賊となればいい
subtitles.english: If you're going to fight to protect, then you should become a pirate.

subtitles.original: ヨーホーホーホー　ハラヘー
subtitles.english: Yo-ho-ho-ho, Hara-he...

subtitles.original: 幸せ　簡単に愛の中消えてしまう
subtitles.english: Happiness easily vanishes within love.

subtitles.original: 悲鳴をただ見てることが許せないなら
subtitles.english: If you can't forgive yourself for just watching people scream...

subtitles.original: 独りきりで震えていた弱い自分消えはしない
subtitles.english: The weak self that trembled alone will not disappear.

subtitles.original: それでも決意胸に抱けばもう惑わない
subtitles.english: But if you hold resolve in your heart, you won't hesitate anymore.

subtitles.original: 道半ばで倒れた友に託された言葉抱き
subtitles.english: Embracing the words entrusted to me by a friend who fell on the way...

subtitles.original: 怒り上げ　自由の旗上げて突き進め
subtitles.english: Raise the anchor, hoist the flag of freedom, and charge forward.

subtitles.original: 大海原　燃え上がれ
subtitles.english: Blaze up in the vast ocean.

subtitles.original: どんな運命だろうとも消えることなきこの唸れ
subtitles.english: No matter what destiny awaits, let this roar never fade.

subtitles.original: 怒り上げ　勇気の旗掲げて旅立とう
subtitles.english: Raise the anchor, hoist the flag of courage, and let's set off.

subtitles.original: 嵐の海　立ち上がれ
subtitles.english: Rise up in the stormy sea.

subtitles.original: 幸せは願えば手に入るほど安くはない
subtitles.english: Happiness is not so cheap that you can get it just by wishing.

subtitles.original: 守るために戦うなら海賊となればいい
subtitles.english: If you're going to fight to protect, then you should become a pirate.

subtitles.original: ヨーホーホーホー　ハラヘー
subtitles.english: Yo-ho-ho-ho, Hara-he...

subtitles.original: ヨーホーホーホー　ハラヘー
subtitles.english: Yo-ho-ho-ho, Hara-he...

subtitles.original: ホーホーヘー　ホーホーヘー　ヨーホーホーヘー
subtitles.english: Ho-ho-he, Ho-ho-he, Yo-ho-ho-he...

subtitles.original: 恐れずにここで暁の勝利のために立ち上がれ
subtitles.english: Fearlessly rise up here for the victory of the dawn.

subtitles.original: ヨーホーホーホー　ハラヘー
subtitles.english: Yo-ho-ho-ho, Hara-he...

subtitles.original: ヨーホーホーホー　ハラヘー
subtitles.english: Yo-ho-ho-ho, Hara-he...

subtitles.original: ホーホーヘー　ホーホーヘー　ヨーホーホーヘー
subtitles.english: Ho-ho-he, Ho-ho-he, Yo-ho-ho-he...

subtitles.original: 独りきりいつか集まればやがて偉大なる海賊団だ
subtitles.english: When those who were alone gather, we'll become a great pirate crew.

subtitles.original: いかりあげー　出航！！
subtitles.english: Raise the anchor— Set sail!!

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで、なんと横山智佐さんに来ていただきました！
subtitles.english: Alright! And so, we have the one and only Chisa Yokoyama here with us!

subtitles.original: はい、ろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you for having me.

subtitles.original: お願いします。あ、ちょっと改めて自己紹介をしていただいてもよろしいでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Thank you. Oh, could I ask you to introduce yourself once again?

subtitles.original: もちろんです。帝国華撃団・花組、真宮寺さくらです！
subtitles.english: Of course. I'm Sakura Shinguji of the Imperial Assault Force, Flower Division!

subtitles.original: と演じ続けて29年目になっています、横山智佐です！
subtitles.english: And I'm Chisa Yokoyama, now in my 29th year of playing the role!

subtitles.original: きゅ～！すごい！
subtitles.english: Kyan! Amazing!

subtitles.original: マリンさんお誕生日おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Marine-san, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！本当に...
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! Truly...
